sentences.english: In the same year, the territory's first public indoor garden show in the opening scissors Lane.
sentences.chinese: 同年，境内第一座公共室内戏园在剪子巷开业。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in self- concept between two sub -groups with different age in left -behind children.
sentences.chinese: 不同年龄组留守儿童的自我意识比较无显著性差异。

sentences.english: The Holy Box was released the same year by Lucretia Records including exclusive acoustic tracks.
sentences.chinese: 圣盒被释放，同年由卢克记录包括独家声曲目。

sentences.english: Expectional children are different in some significant way from others of the same age.
sentences.chinese: 特殊儿童在一些重大的方面不同于同年龄的其他孩子。

sentences.english: In that same year, the United States ran a trade deficit of $709 billion.
sentences.chinese: 同年，美国的贸易逆差达到7090亿美元。

sentences.english: Also in Fifteen-Thirteen, Vasco Nunez de Balboa crossed the Isthmus of Panama and reached the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 同年，巴尔沃亚跨过了巴拿马地峡到达了太平洋。

sentences.english: In the same year keratoacanthoma appeared on the right ear, and was removed by surgery later.
sentences.chinese: 同年右耳廓发生角化棘皮瘤，手术切除治愈。

sentences.english: She had no friends of her own age.
The two countries signed in November the same year, "Japan-Korea Agreement on books."
sentences.chinese: 两国在同年11月签署了《日韩图书协定》。

sentences.english: In the same year DreamWorks SKG produced The Prince of Egypt using traditional animation techniques.
sentences.chinese: 在同年梦工厂使用传统动画又生产了《埃及王子》。

sentences.english: All the students in the same grade will have a get-together today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有同年级的同学一起进行联欢。

sentences.english: That same year, under the auspices of his and the establishment of a Royal Academy of Dance.
sentences.chinese: 同年，在他的主持下，又建立了皇家舞蹈学院。

sentences.english: That same year saw Matthäus granted the firstever FIFA World Player of the Year award.
sentences.chinese: 同年，马特乌斯获得了国际足联第一届最佳球员奖。

sentences.english: At the same year should a of the Japanese Jin friend meeting invite, leaving for the day to hold personal calligraphy exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 同年应日本晋友会出资邀请，赴日举行个人书法展。

sentences.english: She also received the David Cohen British Literature Prize.
sentences.chinese: 同年，她也荣获英国戴维柯恩文学奖。

sentences.english: I measured myself not against adults but against age-mates.
sentences.chinese: 我不与成年人较量而与同年龄的伙伴相比衡量自己。

definition: early or late/priority/in succession/one after another
once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
late last year/the end of last year
